title: Workshop on Analyzing Scholarly Productivity in Instructional Design and Technology (IDT) Programs (Large-Scale)

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational instructional design theory knowledge and experience with educational technology tools
context.additional_context: Learners are professionals (medical/legal/technical) aiming to strengthen instructional design and evaluation competencies through education programs

learning_goals: Learners can explain three core metrics for evaluating the academic productivity of an IDT program (journal publications, handbook contributions, award records).
Learners can comparatively analyze curriculum trends of leading IDT programs (theory-practice balance, technology integration level).
Learners can propose at least two instructional design strategies to enhance expertise in their field of study.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
